frontmatter.title: Focus don't react
frontmatter.description: back to school arrives // loosening grasp of control //focus don't react

frontmatter.title: Mindfully rational
frontmatter.description: Everyone is consumed by more than what's on the surface. Every interaction in influenced by any number of unknown past experiences.

frontmatter.title: Task at hand
frontmatter.description: It's easy to lose focus and become distracted. Real changes have occurred, causing plans to change. Adjust, reassess, then focus on the task at hand.
